Open VPN Service

NOTICE:

The namespace prefix http://cisco.com/jnap/ has been deprecated but is still supported. All JNAP clients should switch to the new namespace prefix http://linksys.com/jnap/.

Services

OpenVPN

http://linksys.com/jnap/openvpn/OpenVPN
This service provides access to a router's Open VPN settings.

Service Actions

  • DownloadClientConnectionProfile
  • GetOpenVPNSettings
  • SetOpenVPNSettings

Actions

DownloadClientConnectionProfile

http://linksys.com/jnap/openvpn/DownloadClientConnectionProfile
This action gets the client connection profile.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
clientConnectionProfile string no The client connection profile.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/openvpn/DownloadClientConnectionProfileResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/openvpn/DownloadClientConnectionProfile"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "clientConnectionProfile": "example string"
  }
}

GetOpenVPNSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/openvpn/GetOpenVPNSettings
This action gets the router's OpenVPN settings.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
isOpenVPNEnabled bool no Whether the OpenVPN is enabled.
allowRemoteConfigure bool no Whether a user can configure OpenVPN when connected remotely.
serverIPAddress IPAddress yes The IP address of the VPN Server. If using serverIPAddress, then don't specify a hostname.
hostname string yes The hostname of the VPN Server. If using hostname, then don't specify a serverIPAddress.
clientIPStartAddress IPAddress no The starting IP address of the client address range.
serverPort int no The port of the VPN Server.
protocol IPProtocol no The protocol of the VPN Server.
profiles Profile[] no The list of user profiles.
maxProfiles int no Maximum number of user profiles allowed.
maxConcurrentConnections int no Maximum concurrent connections supported by the OpenVPN server.
clientProfileUpdated bool no Whether the client connection profile has been updated since the last download.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/openvpn/GetOpenVPNSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/openvpn/GetOpenVPNSettings"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "isOpenVPNEnabled": true,
    "allowRemoteConfigure": true,
    "serverIPAddress": "192.168.1.101",
    "hostname": "foo.bar.gov",
    "clientIPStartAddress": "192.168.1.101",
    "serverPort": 1194,
    "protocol": "TCP",
    "profiles": [
      {
        "username": "uberparanoiduser",
        "password": "Please-Let-Me-In"
      }
    ],
    "maxProfiles": 25,
    "maxConcurrentConnections": 5,
    "clientProfileUpdated": true
  }
}

SetOpenVPNSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/openvpn/SetOpenVPNSettings
This action sets the router's OpenVPN settings.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
isOpenVPNEnabled bool no Whether the OpenVPN is enabled.
allowRemoteConfigure bool no Whether a user can configure OpenVPN when connected remotely.
serverIPAddress IPAddress yes The IP address of the VPN Server. If using serverIPAddress, then don't specify a hostname.
hostname string yes The hostname of the VPN Server. If using hostname, then don't specify a serverIPAddress.
clientIPStartAddress IPAddress no The starting IP address of the client address range.
serverPort int no The port of the VPN Server. This value must be between 0 and 65535. Default is 1194.
protocol IPProtocol no The protocol of the VPN Server.
profiles Profile[] no The list of user profiles.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/openvpn/SetOpenVPNSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorDuplicateUsernames The specified profile list contains duplicates.
ErrorInvalidClientIPAddress The specified client IP start address is not valid.
ErrorInvalidHostName The specified host name is not valid.
ErrorInvalidPassword The specified password is invalid.
ErrorInvalidPort The specified port is not between 0 and 65535.
ErrorInvalidServerIPAddress The specified server IP address is not valid.
ErrorInvalidUsername The specified username is invalid.
ErrorSuperfluousServerIPAddress Only serverIPAddress or hostname can be specified, not both.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/openvpn/SetOpenVPNSettings"

{
  "isOpenVPNEnabled": true,
  "allowRemoteConfigure": true,
  "serverIPAddress": "192.168.1.101",
  "hostname": "example string",
  "clientIPStartAddress": "192.168.1.101",
  "serverPort": 123,
  "protocol": "TCP",
  "profiles": [
    {
      "username": "uberparanoiduser",
      "password": "Please-Let-Me-In"
    }
  ]
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

Structures

Profile

http://linksys.com/jnap/openvpn/Profile
An OpenVPN Profile. The restrictions are taken from the OpenVPN manual at http://openvpn.net/index.php/open-source/documentation/manuals/427-openvpn-22.html

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
username string no The username of the profile. It must be between 8-64 characters and it must consist only of these characters: alphanumeric, underbar ('_'), dash ('-'), dot ('.'), or at ('@')
password string no The password of the profile. It must be between 8-64 characters and it must consist only of these characters: alphanumeric, underbar ('_'), dash ('-'), dot ('.'), or at ('@')

Enumerations

IPProtocol

http://linksys.com/jnap/openvpn/IPProtocol
This service provides access to a router's Open VPN settings. IP protocols.

Enumeration Values

Value Description
TCP The TCP protocol.
UDP The UDP protocol.
